special_text:
Fable [i](You may trigger the chapters of this saga in any order. You choose which chapter to use as you place lore counters on it.)[/i]
I – Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest.
II – Each player chooses a number of cards in their hand equal to the number of cards in the hand of the player with the fewest cards in their hand, then discards the rest.
III – Each player chooses a number of creatures they control equal to the number of creatures controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest.
